subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Even if Jimmie Johnson does not seek the spotlight, he has found fame and even a bit of infamy in his four-plus years on the Nascar's Nextel Cup circuit.
snippet: Even if Jimmie Johnson does not seek the spotlight, he has found fame and even a bit of infamy in his four-plus years on the Nascar's Nextel Cup circuit.
